mapper.select: select reply_name, reply_story, reg_date, reply_code, free_code, member_code from reply where free_code = #{free_code}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_code,free_code, reply_name, reply_story, reg_date, member_code) values(REPLY_CODE_SEQ.nextval, #{free_code}, #{reply_name}, #{reply_story} ,sysdate, ${member_code})
